events.message: I recently received my order but I want to request a refund because the product is not what I expected and I no longer want it.
The customer's issue has been categorized under 'Refund' due to keywords indicating a request for money back and dissatisfaction.
Support agent Michael has been assigned to handle the refund request case submitted by the customer.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm here to assist you with your refund request and will do my best to resolve this quickly.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the refund so that I can process your request more efficiently?
My order number is 785920, and the item doesnâ€™t meet the description on your website, so I want to return it and get my money back.
Thank you for the details. I have initiated the refund process for your order 785920 and sent you a prepaid return label to your email.
Thanks for the quick response. I received the return label and will send the product back tomorrow. Appreciate your help!
We confirmed receipt of your returned item and processed the refund to your original payment method. Please allow 3-5 business days to reflect.
Just checking in to ensure you received the refund and that everything is satisfactory. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Since there have been no further issues reported, we are closing this case now. Thank you for contacting support and have a great day!
